Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman in April, Russolillo reports.`` The stock-trading plan, unveiled in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, said Eric Schmidt intends to sell as much as 534,000 Class A shares during the course of the year. as Google CEO Google just announced a huge change in management. As of April, Eric Schmidt is out as CEO, and co-founder Larry Page will take over his day-to-day duties. Meanwhile, co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. Eric Schmidt 's new role will be Executive Chairman. He will focus`` externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership,'' the company announced. Eric Schmidt

SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.''
